title: Introducing: Formation
body:
There’s little info around by London duo **Formation** right now, save from this tellingly short [interview](http://www.

abeano.com/formation-waves/) conducted by Abeano (thanks for the heads up) and their Basquiat inspired [website](http://www.frmtn.com/). Identical twin brothers, their debut release, _Waves_, was recorded in their mum’s living room, an intoxicatingly repetitive jam, in keeping with the current influx of modern, cooler-than-cooler odd-pop flooding the blogs. Check out Waves below.
